titlestmt.titleproper: Preliminary Guide to the Pamela Jordan Yale School of Drama Scrapbook Collection
Jordan (Pamela) Yale School of Drama Scrapbook Collection
titlestmt.author: Compiled by Colleen Reilly

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Thursday January 10, 2019 at 00:00

did.unittitle: Pamela Jordan Yale School of Drama Scrapbook Collection
did.abstract: Collection of scrapbooks documenting the activities of the Yale School of Drama, Yale Repertory Theatre, and Yale Cabaret, 1966-2008.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The Pamela Jordan Yale School of Drama Scrapbook Collection was housed in the former Drama Library until its transfer to the Robert B. Haas Family Arts Library in 2008.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Pamela Jordan Yale School of Drama Scrapbook Collection, Robert B. Haas Family Arts Library, Yale University.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Pamela C. Jordan served the Yale School of Drama Library for 34 years. In that time she assisted numerous artists, faculty, staff, and students in their research and production work, and served as the documentarian for the Yale School of Drama and Yale Repertory Theatre activities.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Collection of scrapbooks documenting the activities of the Yale School of Drama, Yale Repertory Theatre, and Yale Cabaret, 1966-2008.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Key to Abbreviations: YSD = Yale School of Drama; YRT = Yale Repertory Theatre
